snippet: At least four United Nations peacekeepers were killed and 15 wounded when their convoy hit a mine in northern Mali on Tuesday, a spokesman said.
abstract: At least four United Nations peacekeepers are killed and 15 wounded after their convoy hits mine in northern Mali.
lead_paragraph: At least four United Nations peacekeepers were killed and 15 wounded when their convoy hit a mine in northern Mali on Tuesday, a spokesman said.

headline.main: Mali: U.N. Peacekeepers Die After Convoy Hits Mine
headline.print_headline: Mali: U.N. Peacekeepers Die After Convoy Hits Mine
